chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
hello
alrighty, i'm at the start point
the twig leads to the tiger's island. instructions please?
yeah
okay
so, the twig path it is then, right? now on tiger island. where to now?
to the elephant island
cool! so i'm heading southwest to the parrot, then turning left to the elephant
is that right?
yeah correct
perfect! i'm at the elephant
where to now?
go to left to the frog
sweet! i'll go southeast to the rocks, then left to mr
frog's island. am i right?
right
made it to the frog! want me to keep going left to the crocodile now?
yes left to the crocodile and giraffee island
oh, fun! going left to say hi to the croc and then it's off to the giraffe island
is that on the right path?
yes its correct path
great! i'm with the giraffe now
which way should i head to find the treasure?
then to the snake island and you reach the treasure
got it! going southeast to the snake, then two steps east to the treasure
yes
yooo! i see the treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
hii
awesome! from where the white dog is sitting, move a few steps to the left, just under the wooden bench. from there, cross the trail toward the florist stand
but wait! don't go all the way to the stand, make a u-turn to your left and head back towards our white doggy friend. got it?
yes i got it
cool! now, cross over that branch south of you and follow the path downwards
keep walking until you find another white dog chilling by a picnic
where you want to gpo
to continue, pass over the picnic mat. remember to try and touch the bowl of berries as you go
then follow the path towards the west. can you do that for me?
yes
i follow your steps
excellent! you're doing great
now, see that wooden branch that crosses the river? head north over it
you're doing awesome! once you've crossed the river, aim to circle around the green bush from the right side
easy peasy, right?
yes
then
can you see the florist stand now? make your way to it, but avoid touching it! instead, turn left and walk under the stand
right ahead, see that big bridge with the two cyclists? walk past it heading west
you're doing great!
there is a vegetable store near the bridge
no problem, just continue on your path. you're looking for two elderly folks sitting on a bench, reading newspapers
they are right past the bridge. you see them?
yes
awesome! now, move a few steps south, between the old folks and another wooden branch
can you spot a green bush by the end of the branch? that's your next landmark
they are reading newspaper
sounds lovely, doesn't it? now, move a few steps east, with the branch on one side and the bush on your other side
ok then
brilliant! keep heading east for a little while, you're almost at the end of this fun journey
then i have to cross the branch
no need to cross the branch again
keep going until you find a brown young deer. say 'hi' to the cutie from me, will you?

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hello
hey, i'm at the tent right now
which direction do i go from here?
come south westyou came accrossdog
great, i see the dog
which way do i go from here?
take left and came accross the campfire
got it! now, i'm at the campfire, where to next?
then go straight you find tha path and head south and you saw the car
oh, there's the blue car
nice! where next pal?
then again take left and head south to you reach pass some bushes and saw the telescope
and voila, there's the telescope! now what's next?
turn left and go straight you reach the wooden house
yay, i've reached the wooden house
we are done here! *finished*

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
hello... where are you right now?

you are at the three palm trees at the top of the map, right? from there, just head south-west, under the first palm. you'll need to go right, gliding past the second palm, then make a quick left before hitting the third
you'll be heading south from there. easy peasy! let me know when you're done
okay
i saw the dog
hello
hey! now, see that brown puppy to your left? navigate left towards it, just a smidge, then make a swift right turn heading south
you're doing great!
